title: Kang Byul
text:
Kang Byul (born August 9, 1990) is a South Korean actress. She made her acting debut in 2008 and was cast in her first leading role in the <a href="Korean%20drama">television drama</a> "<a href="Miss%20Mamma%20Mia">Miss Mamma Mia</a>" (2015).
Personal life.
Her maternal uncle is actor <a href="Kang%20Sung-jin">Kang Sung-jin</a>.
